about_the_game:
Content Warning: Includes Jokes about Raids, Pillaging and Invasions by Vikings



Doki Doki Ragnarok is a viking visual novel in which you pillage and date villages around the world. It takes place in a ridiculous world where viking raids are like going on a date - with the village!
For vikings, raiding a village is more than warfare: it means dating, flirting, and understanding each other consensually. Show that you carry a conversation as easy as you carry an axe.



Choose from a wide cast of diverse vikings and unravel the peculiarities of each village. Find out what they truly desire from the viking of their dreams. You can always revisit past conquests to experience alternative dates.
Will you find the village of your dreams?




  • Date quirky villages across Europe!
  • Choose from a wide cast of diverse vikings
  • Choose your voice regardless of your appearance
  • Encounter Odin, other vikings, local people and various animals!
  • Revisit dates to explore alternative outcomes
  • Stay in touch with past conquests in case someone invents a Dating App.
  • Collect achievements by choosing the weirdest, funniest or plain most unlikely options on your dates!


  • Cloud Save
  • Achievements


  • Over 130.000 lines of dialog (counting all possible dialog options)
  • Includes bizarre goat facts from norse mythology

Content Warning: Includes Jokes about Raids, Pillaging and Invasions by Vikings



Doki Doki Ragnarok is a viking visual novel in which you pillage and date villages around the world. It takes place in a ridiculous world where viking raids are like going on a date - with the village!
For vikings, raiding a village is more than warfare: it means dating, flirting, and understanding each other consensually. Show that you carry a conversation as easy as you carry an axe.



Choose from a wide cast of diverse vikings and unravel the peculiarities of each village. Find out what they truly desire from the viking of their dreams. You can always revisit past conquests to experience alternative dates.
Will you find the village of your dreams?




  • Date quirky villages across Europe!
  • Choose from a wide cast of diverse vikings

  • Collect achievements by choosing the weirdest, funniest or plain most unlikely options on your dates!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.4, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: 1Ghz Intel or AMD (x86) Processor with SSE2
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+
  • Additional Notes: If you have issues running the game, please contact us. We have some Linux knowledge, but not many test devices.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13 or newer
  • Processor: Intel or Apple Silicon Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, nVidia or AMD
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any Mac or Macbook from 2012 should be able to play the game

name: Doki Doki Ragnarok

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1Ghz Intel or AMD (x86) Processor with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Any modern computer or laptop should be able to play the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“This was a risky project, given the automatic assumptions someone might make about a game where dating and invading are conflated. Cast aside all those concerns, because this is a game where consent is primary, yet nonsense is overwhelmingly more important. It’s so funny that this is so lovely, and it’s lovely that this is so funny.”
Kotaku

“Doki Doki Ragnarok is a game that’s incredibly difficult to describe without sounding like you’re three days out from the last time you slept, but I promise you that you won’t regret playing it”
75/100 – Gaming Age

“Doki Doki Ragnarok is an absolutely ridiculous game — in a good way, of course. It has some spelling mistakes and isn’t meant to be taken seriously. Truthfully, I had a lot of fun playing it, and I would have loved it if there was more to do.”
8/10 – GameGrin
short_description: Doki Doki Ragnarok is a viking visual novel in which you pillage and date villages around the world. It takes place in a ridiculous world where viking raids are like going on a date - with the village!
